text:
Cyber Security | EclecticIQ | Amsterdam, Netherlands | Full-time | ONSITE

Hey! I am Marko from EclecticIQ.

We're a Technology startup working on solving how to effectively use and operate Cyber Threat Intelligence.

Our product, THREAT INTELLIGENCE PLATFORM, enables organisations to consolidate, analyse, integrate and collaborate on cyber threat intel from multiple sources.

Recently we closed series A and now on our way to increase our market reach-out and further evolve our product.

We're looking for some new local (no relocation and visas) talent to help us get to the next level.

* UI Engineer (React) * Software Engineer (Python) * DevOps Engineer

Full job specs and submissions @ https://www.eclecticiq.com/jobs?id=346293000000571041
